Title: Rankin-eisenstein classes for modular forms
Abstract: © 2020 by Johns Hopkins University Press.In this paper we make a systematic study of certain motivic cohomology classes (“Rankin-Eisenstein classes”) attached to the Rankin-Selberg convolution of two modular forms of weight ≥ 2. The main result is the computation of the p-adic syntomic regulators of these classes. As a consequence we prove many cases of the Perrin-Riou conjecture for Rankin-Selberg convolutions of cusp forms.
